content:
Hi!
I am glad to announce the Second Brazilian Meeting in Category Theory.
The event will be held in the University of SÃ£o Paulo. Dates: March 20-24, 2023
We are planning to make an online transmission on Youtube, but speakers are expected to present their contribution in person.
The speakers are free to choose to present in English or in Portuguese.
We are not expecting submissions from abroad so we didn't created an application form in English. If you would like to apply, contact me or send an email to encontrocategorico@ime.usp.br
